Hate that Bush is spying on Americans? How about this idea...
 Encourage everyone you know to make a phone call to a Muslim country. Just think how much fun the NSA (National Security Agency) will have trying to figure out who is a spy if thousands of regular Americans start making oversea calls to nations Bush considers suspect. 
 
 Don't know anyone in Afghanistan, Syria, Palestine, Iran, Iraq, Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, etc? Just do a search on google for phone numbers in those countries. I did one and found a good source: http://www.numberway.com/phone-numbers/301/ And if they speak English (or you speak their language) make a friend!
 
 Pass this grass roots idea on!

post_info.post_title: A monkey wrench for NSA's spying on Americans
